title: Brownie biscotti
ingredients: ['75g butter, softened', '125g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g plain flour', '5 tablespoons cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '100g chocolate chips or buttons, roughly chopped', '30g chopped walnuts', '1 egg yolk, beaten', '1 tablespoon water']
